clues: The dance done by women during Diwali

The dance in Gondi community done on the first day of wedding when mandap is established.
This continues throughout the night

guess1: the instrument that farmers pray to during the first festival of chhattisgarh is the **plough**.
guess2: the instrument that farmers pray to during the first festival of chhattisgarh is the **seed drill**.
clues:
The festival in which farmer's pray to their instrument.
It is the first festival of Chhattisgarh.
The festival done to celebrate the first day of festival

The festival in which women go back to their maiden home.
It is a very important festival for females.

A festival where people go to each others house with baskets asking for grains.
Usually done by boys and kids.
It is done on the Purnima after Diwali.
A dance done during Diwali that makes use of Lathi and ghungroo
A ceremony done by males to solidify their friendships

The festival celebrated a day or two before Diwali.
In this a Kalash is decorated by unmarried girls and is taken to the Village head's house
This festival represents the marriage of two God's
The dance done by bride and groom at the end of the marriage at the groom's house
